entry.title: New release for Cryptgeon: v2.8.1
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Move shared package into cli by @cupcakearmy in https://github.com/cupcakearmy/cryptgeon/pull/148

Full Changelog: https://github.com/cupcakearmy/cryptgeon/compare/v2.8.0...v2.8.1

entry.title: New release for Cryptgeon: v2.8.3
entry.content:
What's Changed

New Contributors

entry.title: New release for Cryptgeon: v2.9.0
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Update Redis documentation link in Docker Compose file by @werewolfboy13 in https://github.com/cupcakearmy/cryptgeon/pull/163
  • fix: introduce locks for delete endpoint to guarantee view counter by @cupcakearmy in https://github.com/cupcakearmy/cryptgeon/pull/166
  • some frontend love by @cupcakearmy in https://github.com/cupcakearmy/cryptgeon/pull/167

New Contributors

  • @werewolfboy13 made their first contribution in https://github.com/cupcakearmy/cryptgeon/pull/163

Full Changelog: https://github.com/cupcakearmy/cryptgeon/compare/v2.8.4...v2.9.0
